attributes.action: for a review into how social services operate
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There are a number of problems that parents have these days with how social services carry out there work and something needs to be done about it as there are parents that have there children removed for no real reason only for social services to meet there target they break every human right law and seem to be above the law.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
